articles.title: What happens if Disney loses its special tax status in Florida? - CNN Video
articles.description: A new Florida law will end the special tax status Disney obtained in 1967. But locals don't want the change, says historian James Clark. "There are no potholes in Disney World. ... In 2004, when almost all of central Florida lost power, Disney kept going."
